long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart Website Blocker is a Chrome extension designed to enhance productivity by enabling users to block distracting websites. With its intuitive interface, users can easily create custom blocklists, empowering them to stay focused and avoid procrastination. Additionally, the extension offers a built-in feature to block adult content, ensuring a safer browsing experience. Boost your productivity and maintain focus with Smart Website Blocker today!
